name: Green Colored Lure - Low Grade
description: A lure used for fishing. The higher the grade of the lure, the less time it will take for a fish to take the bait. This bait is preferred by fast fish

name: Green Colored Lure
description: This fishing lure is preferred by fast fish

name: Green Colored Lure (High Grade)
description: A lure used for fishing. The higher the grade of the lure, the less time it will take for a fish to take the bait. This bait is preferred by fast fish

name: Purple Colored Lure - Low Grade
description: A lure used for fishing. The higher the grade of the lure, the less time it will take for a fish to take the bait. This bait is preferred by fat fish

name: Purple Colored Lure
description: This fishing lure is preferred by fat fish

name: Purple Colored Lure (High Grade)
description: A lure used for fishing. The higher the grade of the lure, the less time it will take for a fish to take the bait. This bait is preferred by fat fish

name: Yellow Colored Lure - Low Grade
description: A lure used for fishing. The higher the grade of the lure, the less time it will take for a fish to bite the bait. This bait is preferred by ugly fish

name: Yellow Colored Lure
description: This fishing lure is preferred by ugly fish

name: Yellow Colored Lure (High Grade)
description: A lure used for fishing. The higher the grade of the lure, the less time it will take for a fish to bite the bait. This bait is preferred by ugly fish

name: Event bait
description: Bait for fishing that increases chance of getting the treasure chest

name: Baby Duck Rod
description: No-grade fishing rod. It can't launch a general attack. Consumes one non-grade Fishing Shot

name: Albatross Rod
description: D-grade fishing rod. It can't launch a general attack. Consumes one D-grade Fishing Shot

name: Pelican Rod
description: C-grade fishing rod. It can't launch a general attack. Consumes one C-grade Fishing Shot

name: KingFisher Rod
description: B-grade fishing rod. It can't launch a general attack. Consumes one B-grade Fishing Shot

name: Cygnus Pole
description: A-grade fishing rod. It can't launch a general attack. Consumes one A-grade Fishing Shot

name: Triton Pole
description: S-grade fishing rod. It can't launch a general attack. Consumes one S-grade Fishing Shot

name: Fishing Shot (No-Grade)
description: Soulshot consumed by a fishing rod like general soulshots. Gives double damage when the pumping or reeling skill is cast. Usable for the no-grade fishing rod

name: Fishing Shot (D-Grade)
description: Soulshot consumed by a fishing rod like general soulshots. Gives double damage when the pumping or reeling skill is cast. Usable for the D-grade fishing rod

name: Fishing Shot (C-Grade)
description: Soulshot consumed by a fishing rod like general soulshots. Gives double damage when the pumping or reeling skill is cast. Usable for the C-grade fishing rod

name: Fishing Shot (B-Grade)
description: Soulshot consumed by a fishing rod like general soulshots. Gives double damage when the pumping or reeling skill is cast. Usable for the B-grade fishing rod

name: Fishing Shot (A-Grade)
description: Soulshot consumed by a fishing rod like general soulshots. Gives double damage when the pumping or reeling skill is cast. Usable for the A-grade fishing rod

name: Fishing Shot (S-Grade)
description: Soulshot consumed by a fishing rod like general soulshots. Gives double damage when the pumping or reeling skill is cast. Usable for the S-grade fishing rod

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-Grade)
description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 4 for A-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. increases by 5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed combat weapons. P. Atk. increases by 8 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (A-Grade)
description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for A-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3 and a HP bonus is granted. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (B-Grade)
description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 3 for B-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. increases by 4 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed combat weapons. P. Atk. increases by 6 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (B-Grade)
description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for B-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3 and a HP bonus is granted. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-Grade)
description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 3 for C-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. increases by 4 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed combat weapons. P. Atk. increases by 6 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 3 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (C-Grade)
description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for C-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3 and a HP bonus is granted. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (D-Grade)
description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 2 for all D-grade weapons with the exception of bow, which will increase by 4. M. Atk. increases by 2 for all weapons. Starting at +4, the P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (D-Grade)
description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for D-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3 and a HP bonus is granted. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (S-Grade)
description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 5 for S-grade one-handed swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. P. Atk. increases by 6 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and two-handed combat weapons. P. Atk. increases by 10 for bows. M. Atk. increases by 4 for all weapons. Starting at +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. bonus double. Enchanting is safe up to +3. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (S-Grade)
description: When enchanted, P. Def. increases by 1 for S-grade armor and accessories. Starting at +4, P. Def. increases by 3 and a HP bonus is granted. Enchanting is safe up to +3, but one-piece body armor can be safely enchanted up to +4. If enchanting fails, the item will not be crystallized but the enchant value will be reset to 0
